title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch — 45 mm

Harness the sun and ride every swell with the Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition. Built rugged and water-rated to 100 meters, this fiber-reinforced polymer watch with scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla Glass delivers unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with sufficient solar exposure and up to 48 hours of GPS with continuous solar charging, so you can stay out longer, track more precisely, and explore farther.

Key features:
- Solar charging performance: Unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with 3 hours/day in 50,000 lux; up to 48 hours in GPS mode with continuous 50,000 lux.
- Surf-ready tools: Wave counter, max speed and distance tracking, and tide data to plan and analyze your sessions.
- Windsurfing and kiteboarding metrics: GPS position, speed, distance, heart rate measurements, and elevation data for jump height.
- Navigation you can trust: 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and multi-GNSS support (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo).
- Health and wellness monitoring: Wrist-based heart rate, sleep tracking, respiration tracking, stress tracking, and Pulse Ox (availability may vary by region and sensors).
- Smart connectivity: Smart notifications, Surfline Sessions compatibility to automatically create clips of your rides at supported breaks, and Connect IQ app/watch face support. Note: Garmin Pay availability varies by configuration; some summaries indicate it may not be included.
- Preloaded activities: Running, biking, swimming, and strength training, plus more via Garmin’s ecosystem.
- Built for extremes: Thermal and shock resistance with a rugged 45 mm case.

What’s in it for surfers and wind riders:
- Track every wave and jump with dedicated profiles and metrics tailored to surf, windsurf, and kitesurf.
- Check tides, analyze performance with Surfline Sessions compatibility, and rely on solar power to extend your days on the water.
- Stay oriented and safe with robust navigation sensors and durable, ocean-ready construction.

If you want a tough, solar-powered multisport watch optimized for surf, windsurf, and kitesurf—with deep health tracking and dependable navigation—the Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition is built to perform where the water meets the wild.
